title: Cobalt–zinc carbides embedded in N-doped porous carbon nanospheres as polysulfide mediators for efficient lithium–sulfur batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29344-29354
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04657A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiangyu Tan, Jiajun Du, Haitao Wu, Xuyu Ma, Chunbo Zhou, Fangrong Zhou, Caijin Fan, Xueqin Xu, Shaocong Hou, Xin Cai
Developing high-efficiency interlayer catalysts is a promising tactic for improving the cycling performance of rechargeable lithium–sulfur (Li–S) batteries.
